title: Ticket #4620: Create a test of DAGMan getting condor_rm'ed
description:
As far as I can see, we don't have a test that makes sure things work properly when a DAGMan job is condor_rm'ed (node jobs get condor_rm'ed, PRE and POST scripts get killed, etc.)

So for this test, I think we could set things up so that a node job condor_rm's DAGMan itself, and we check things by looking at the workflow log file and/or node status file. (Hmm -- I'm not sure how to check that PRE/POST scripts get killed, though.)
check_ins: 2014-Sep-29 17:34   Check-in [41263]: Gittrac #4620: Created new job_dagman_rm test to test the functionality (node jobs removed, running PRE/POST scripts killed) when a condor_dagman job is condor_rm'ed. (By Kent Wenger )
